member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.SellerDealsController.GetDealById(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the deal with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The deal with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.SellerDealsController.Createdeal(Application.Features.SellerInventory.SellerDeals.Commands.CreateDeal.CreateDealRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new deal based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created deal.
